audio_description: Assalamu Alaikum, welcome to my channel Nawabi Dishes. Today your host brings you a very special Eid dish from Lucknow, a very famous one called Mutton Biryani. Viewers, Lucknow’s mutton biryani is truly special, whether for weddings or for serving guests at home.

audio_description: So viewers, for mutton biryani we’ll need 1 kg of long grain basmati rice which we’ll soak for half an hour. We've taken 700 grams of meat and washed it well. We need 2 teaspoons of ginger paste and 2 teaspoons of garlic paste.
